name: Ovnii's Adventure
description:
My entry for the GMTK Jam 2020!

You don't have direct control over the main character, Ovnii. Instead, you give him orders and he follows them!

You can only give him 6 orders at most, and you can not change them mid-level, so choose them carefully!

Each block colour has a distinct pattern, in case you suffer from colour blindness:

  • White blocks are flat.
  • Red blocks have a zig-zag pattern.
  • Purple colours have a diagonals pattern.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
